## hiddenWhenJs variable

Hide when JavaScript loaded.

**Signature:**

```typescript
hiddenWhenJs: SerializedStyles
```

## Remarks

Relies on `<html>` `js` class, which we set in the `getBeforeRenderScriptContent` function in most web projects.
